scripts.knex:warning: echo WARNING: Remember to run 'npm run build' before executing knex scripts!
scripts.knex:migrate:make: npm run -s knex:warning && npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile src/database/knexfile.ts migrate:make MIGRATION_NAME
scripts.knex:seed:make: npm run -s knex:warning && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile dist/database/knexfile.js seed:make MIGRATION_NAME
scripts.knex:seed:run: npm run -s knex:warning && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile dist/database/knexfile.js seed:run
scripts.knex:migrate:latest: npm run -s knex:warning && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile dist/database/knexfile.js migrate:latest
scripts.knex:migrate:rollback: npm run -s knex:warning && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile dist/database/knexfile.js migrate:rollback
scripts.knex:migrate:list: npm run -s knex:warning && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile dist/database/knexfile.js migrate:list
